sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_playbook_exp.CancelProcessesAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Cancel a batch of processes</description>
        <name>CancelProcessesAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CancelProcessesAjax = Class.create();
CancelProcessesAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    cancelProcessess: function() {
        var selectedSysIds = this.getParameter('sysparm_selectedProcesses').split(',');
        var reason = this.getParameter('sysparm_reason');
        selectedSysIds.forEach(function cancelProcess(sysID) {
			var process = new GlideRecord('sys_pd_context');
			process.get(sysID);
			var parent = new GlideRecord(process.getValue("input_table"));
			var cancellableState = process.getValue('state') === 'QUEUED' || process.getValue('state') === 'IN_PROGRESS';
			if (cancellableState && (gs.hasRole('pd_cancel') || parent.get(process.getValue("input_record")) && parent.canWrite())) {
				sn_playbook.PlaybookExperience.cancelPlaybook(process, reason);
			}
        });
    },

    type: 'CancelProcessesAjax'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-10 21:03:37</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0809f57a434661104e75fcc5fbb8f2a3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CancelProcessesAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Playbook Experience" source="sn_playbook_exp">8c524e101b6e0010affd0e55cc4bcbed</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Playbook Experience">8c524e101b6e0010affd0e55cc4bcbed</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0809f57a434661104e75fcc5fbb8f2a3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-11 21:51:10</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
